Instance.description: Debug interaction to teleport a Sim to a selected terrain position.

Tunable.name: _teleporting
Tunable.description: If checked, sim will be instantly be teleported without playing any type of animation.

TunableVariant.name: target_jig
TunableVariant.description: If enabled, a jig can be tuned to place at the target location of the teleport. If placement fails, the interaction will fail.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: The jig to test the target location against.
